description: Eddie Murphy telling the story of how Sammy Davis Jr told him he worshipped the devil. No wonder Sammy Davis was so popular in Hollyweird back in the 50’s and 60’s. Believe it or not, there’s a lot of people who believe in that ridiculous rhetoric that “satan is as powerful as the Heavenly Father”! Do people not know that satan has to ask the Father before he’s allowed to do anything??!! The Heavenly Father is in control of the good and the bad! People better wake up! #hollyweirdisevil #ImReaching #HollyweirdIsEvilFellOff
